MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL74 postcode area of Tyn-Y-Gongl affecting properties in Benllech and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  1:56AM. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is a underground cable fault affecting the remaining customers. Due to the complexities of the repairs to the mains underground cable, our team are now working to get your power back on via generator as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:07PM on 6th March 2021.
